Package com.noelios.restlet.data

Elements of information handled by a component via a connector.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ChannelRepresentation Representation based on a byte channel.
CharacterSetImpl Default character set implementation.
ContentType Represents a content type, associating a media type with a character set.
CookieImpl Default cookie implementation.
CookieSettingImpl Default cookie setting implementation.
CookiesImpl Default cookies implementation.
CookiesReaderImpl Default cookies reader implementation.
FileRepresentation Representation based on a file.
FormImpl Default form implementation.
FormReaderImpl Default form reader implementation.
HeaderReaderImpl Abstract header reader.
InputRepresentation Representation based on an input stream.
LanguageImpl Default language implementation.
MediaTypeImpl Default media type implementation.
MetadataImpl Default metadata implementation.
MethodImpl Default method implementation.
ObjectReader Object instance reader.
ObjectRepresentation Object instance representation.
OutputRepresentation Representation based on an output stream.
ParameterImpl Default parameter implementation.
PreferenceImpl Default preference implementation.
PreferenceReaderImpl Default preference reader implementation.
ReadableRepresentation Representation based on a readable byte channel.
ReferenceImpl Default reference to a uniform resource identifier (URI).
StatusImpl Default status implementation.
StreamRepresentation Representation based on a stream.
StringRepresentation Representation based on a simple string.
TagImpl Default validation tag implementation.
WritableRepresentation Representation based on a writable byte channel.
 

Package com.noelios.restlet.data Description

Elements of information handled by a component via a connector.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
